description:
Precise amounts of complete electrolytes and clean carbohydrates delivered with the refreshing tang of strawberry lemonade and an extra boost of energy care of organic caffeine. Nuun’s Endurance line has been engineered for endurance athletes and those all-day suffer fests. Providing a balanced ratio of ingredients that can be fully absorbed during long workouts, letting you focus on that next PR, not a growling tummy.

  • Designed for workouts longer than 90 minutes
  • Flavoured with real dried fruit powder
  • Ingredients: cane sugar, dextrose, sodium citrate, citric acid, organic natural flavors, potassium citrate, potassium chloride, magnesium citrate, calcium citrate and organic caffeine
name: Nuun Endurance Strawberry Lemonade Hydration Drink Mix
